head.supplied: ¶ [Ackg receipt with thanks of report & plan of Giles's exploratn ¶ M had been sent a copy of'Map of explorations undertaken by direction and at the expense of T. Elder under the command of Ernest Gi...

div.p: GRG35/16, 1876, no. 605, indexes of letters received, Department of Lands, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a letterdated1 March 1876.
[Ackg receipt with thanks of report & plan of Giles's exploratn
M had been sent a copy of'Map of explorations undertaken by direction and at the expense of T. Elder under the command of Ernest Giles: from Beltana Station in the colony of South Australia to the city of Perth in the colony of Western Australia' with G. Goyder to M, 31 December 1875. It is probable thathere he is acknowledging receipt of E. Giles (1876) and the 'Map showing the routes travelled and discoveries made by the exploring expeditions equipped by Thomas Elder and under the command of Ernest Giles between the years 1872-6, theNational Library of Australia'scopy of which is digitized at http://nla.gov.au/nla.obj-232133673. This map shows the journey to Perthandthe earlier attempts by Giles, and the routes of some other explorers in central Australia.
]
